p: 2. Lines 55-59: “DENV, as a member of the genus Flavivirus in the family Flaviviridae, is an enveloped, single stranded, positive-sense RNA virus [8]. The DENV genome is approximately 11,000 nucleotides in length and encodes three structural proteins, namely, the capsid (C), premembrane (prM), and envelope (E) proteins, and seven nonstructural (NS) proteins (NS1,NS2A, NS2B, NS3, NS4A, NS4B and NS5) in a single open reading frame (ORF) [9,10].”References 8, 9 and 10 are not appropriate for the citation here.
